name: Classic Snake (itch)
description:
Play the classic SNAKE. This game is a snake game that is made similar and still looks classic and simple game like '97 SNAKE.
Complete with a matrix of spots and monotonous sound. A more modern looks but with the same nostalgic sensation adds to and peels like the original version.
Just SWIPE your phone screen, then hunt with SNAKE!
SNAKE features; there are 3 stages that keep you going and keep playing.
